Description:
Your computer motherboard must be a server motherboard, It must support SAS, if not, please do not buy it.

It can be used for SAS hard drives to SAS motherboards, but it is not possible to use home motherboards for SAS hard drives,It has no chip conversion function.

It is only used to convert your SAS hard drive interface to a SATA interface and then to connect your SAS computer motherboard,SAS drives are backward compatible, Usually SAS supports SAS and SATA interfaces.

Attention , when you buy it, your computer motherboard must support SAS motherboards, which are server motherboards.
Label: Adaptador SAS to SATA SFF 8482 180 Degree
